sentences.en: a baby crawling on all fours.
Chamberlain scored 50 or more points four times in the season.
sentences.cn: 张伯伦在赛季中有4次得分不低于50。

sentences.en: Four of them had gone off to find help.
sentences.cn: 他们中的4个人去寻求帮助了。

sentences.en: He described the difficulties of surviving for four months as a captive.
sentences.cn: 他描述了被俘4个月里挣扎求生的艰难岁月。

sentences.en: Its profits are rising four times faster than the average company.
sentences.cn: 它的利润增长速度比一般公司快4倍。

sentences.en: Last year, economic growth tailed off to below four percent.
sentences.cn: 去年，经济增长率下降到4%以下。

sentences.en: Luke will soon be four (= four years old ) .
Remove the meat with a fork and divide it among four plates.
sentences.cn: 用餐叉把肉叉走，分到4个盘里。

sentences.en: She denied the murder of four children who were in her care.
sentences.cn: 她否认杀害了她所照管的4个孩子。

sentences.en: She is married with four children.
Sixteen teams are taking part, divided into four groups.
Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentences.cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

sentences.en: The key issue was whether the four defendants acted dishonestly.
sentences.cn: 关键问题是4名被告是否存在欺诈行为。

sentences.en: The news programme goes out four times a week at peak time.
sentences.cn: 这档新闻节目每周在黄金时段播出4次。

sentences.en: The things that stuck out were his cockiness and his four-letter words.
sentences.cn: 与众不同之处在于他的骄傲自大和满嘴脏话。

sentences.en: They arrived just after four (= four o’clock ) .
sentences.cn: 刚过四点钟，他们就到了。

sentences.en: Try to eat at least four slices of bread a day.
sentences.cn: 每天尽量至少吃4片面包。

sentences.en: With four laps to go, he kept pace with the leaders.
sentences.cn: 还剩4圈的时候，他紧紧咬住领先者。

sentences.en: Young people came from the four corners of the nation.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的年轻人都来到这里。

words.tran_cn: 第四的，第四个的；四分之一的
四人的一组；四人对抗赛
第十四；月的第十四日；十四分之一
第四，月的第四日；四分之一

phrases.tran_cn: 四大银行；大四星；四大会计师事务所
四个现代化（农，工，国防，科技）；四化
（佛教教义精华）四谛。 见 Buddhism
完全一致；四脚着地地；匍匐
四大自由（富兰克林•德•罗斯福1941年国会演讲中宣布，即：　言论和表达自由、信仰自由、不虞匮乏的自由和避免恐惧的自由）

trans.tran_cn: 四，四个人（或事物）的一组，得四分的一击，四人赛艇的全体成员；四人赛艇
